paper.title: The dynamic locking heuristic-a new graph partitioning algorithm

author.org: Sch. of Comput. Sci. & Eng., New South Wales Univ., Kensington, NSW, Australia

paper.venue: International Symposium on Circuits and Systems
paper.abstract: In layout design finding efficiently good solutions to the hypergraph bipartitioning problem is of great importance. This paper introduces a new algorithm, the dynamic locking algorithm, which has empirically shown a significant improvement in the partitioning result compared to known algorithms. u003e
